title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 10
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 10
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" TeleTech Holdings (TTEC). TeleTech Holdings Inc.'s shares climbed to a 10-year high in response to the customer-service and consulting company's first-quarter results. Earnings not only surpassed the average analyst estimate in a Bloomberg survey for the first time in two years, but also beat the highest projection. TeleTech's revenue also exceeded estimates.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
